Chapter 1910: Concealing Virtue and Fame

Moreover, Prince Hai's substitute body, which had been actively seeking out Song Shuhang, hoped to utilize this substitute body to break through the causal relationship between Song Shuhang and himself.

If Song Shuhang hadn't entered Prince Hai's dream, he might have been able to deceive his way past. Song Shuhang was extremely confident in Prince Hai's planning and strategic abilities. If it weren't for bad luck, Prince Hai might have already planned out Song Shuhang's demise months ago.

【However, since Prince Hai himself wanted to deliver the substitute body to my doorstep, I don't have any reason not to accept it.】 Song Shuhang said with a smile.

The substitute body was definitely worth a lot, and it was a big gift package.

As he thought about it, Song Shuhang suddenly exited the 'entering a dream' state.

The dream ended.

He slowly opened his eyes and found himself lying on a large bed in a room, with his shoes still on.

Song Shuhang looked up at the window and saw that the sky was gradually brightening, signaling the start of a new day.

He took out his phone to check the date and time: November 19, 2019, Tuesday, 7:00 am.

"This sleep was really long, and Whitehead's self-made hypnotic smoke bomb is indeed not an exaggeration." Song Shuhang said as he got out of bed and opened the 'Core World'.

Su Shuangshuang stepped out of the Core World, looking refreshed after her closed-door training. Her skin was as white as snow, and her muscles were as tender as a boiled egg, making people want to touch her.

"Good morning, Shuhang," Su Shuangshuang stretched lazily. "Why didn't you respond yesterday?"

She had ended her closed-door training the previous night and tried to exit the Core World, but Song Shuhang didn't respond. Instead, Turtle Master and Onion Lady were attracted by her call and stayed with her until now.

Song Shuhang lightly poked her face with his finger.

Su Shuangshuang: "..."

"Really good," Song Shuhang said, "this touch feels really satisfying: Ah, yesterday Whitehead's new invention went wrong, and I got caught in it, sleeping until now."

"It makes sense," Su Shuangshuang said.

Behind them, Turtle Master and Onion Lady also emerged from the Core World.

"Are we going to the Confucian school today?" Su Shuangshuang asked.

"Yeah, we'll leave soon to meet with Henghuo Elder," Song Shuhang nodded. "By the way, did you guys see the 'Gem Fruit' in the Core World? It tastes really good. When eating it, remember to leave the pit behind, as it has another use."

"We brought some back with us, and we all tried a few," Onion Lady laughed. "After eating it, we felt like our cultivation level had improved a bit."

"That's great, bring some back to give to Elder Qi tomorrow," Song Shuhang said.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

同时，他的神识扫过楼层，准备联系下恒火前辈。
“咦？白前辈分身和恒火前辈都不在家？”宋书航疑惑道。
两位前辈都跑哪去了？
葱娘：“或许是去吃早餐了？”
“我打个电话问问。”苏氏阿十六掏出手机，给恒火真君打了个电话白前辈是分身状态，不确定他身上有没有带手机，所以直接联系恒火真君会比较好。
电话很快就接通了。
苏氏阿十六：“早安，恒火前辈，你和白前辈哪去了？”
“白道友操作失误，将我们俩送到火星上去了。”恒火真君一脸绝望。
“火星上还有信号？新版本的魔改手机吗？”宋书航凑到阿十六手机边上，问道。
恒火真君：“不是，我们现在处于白道友火星的秘密基地中，手机只有在这个基地范围内才有信号。我们中午就回地球，现在白道友在进行几个实验。”
“好的，前辈。那我们中午见。”苏氏阿十六回道。
“跑火星去了啊，白前辈到底要怎么个失误法，才会将他和恒火真君都送到火星去？”宋书航哭笑不得。
苏氏阿十六收起手机：“那早上我们干什么？”
宋书航捏着下巴：“嘿，趁着有空，不如我们去找公子海吧。”
“公子海？谁啊？”龟前辈道。
葱娘：“宋书航的一生之敌，现在应该是五品灵皇境界。”
龟前辈翻了个白眼。
“就是那位得到何止魔帝传承的魔修，他的计谋能力非常的厉害，就是运气不是很好。”宋书航道。
“你还真的要去欺侮那个魔修啊。”赤霄剑前辈道。
宋书航：“我有种预感，他会给我一个惊喜。”说不定自己想要的‘心魔劫’也能从公子海身上得到。
苏氏阿十六问道：“书航你知道公子海在哪？”
“嘿嘿嘿，昨天我睡觉时入梦了公子海，稍稍得到了点情报。”宋书航道。
苏氏阿十六点头道：“那我们就去找他吧，现在七点，我们速度得快点……白前辈他们说不定１１、１２点就回来了。”
“我先留点东西。”宋书航打开房间里的储物箱，然后在其中放了一枚‘宝石果实’加一份黑龙世界的化形‘石乳’，另外又放了十枚‘刀意通玄莲子’。
葱娘：“咦？这些东西放在储物箱里干嘛？不如让我将它们吃掉吧？”
“这些是给小彩留的。”宋书航轻轻弹了弹葱娘的葱尖。

system

葱娘：“咦？这些东西放在储物箱里干嘛？不如让我将它们吃掉吧？”
“这些是给小彩留的。”宋书航轻轻弹了弹葱娘的葱尖。assistant

At the same time, his consciousness swept over the floor, preparing to contact Elder Henghuo.

"What? Elder Bai's doppelganger and Elder Henghuo are not at home?" Song Shuhang was puzzled.

The two elders had run off somewhere.

Cabbage Nanny: "Perhaps they went to have breakfast?"

"I'll call to ask." Su Shi A Sixteen took out her phone and called Elder Henghuo. Elder Bai was in a doppelganger state, and it was uncertain whether he had his phone with him, so it would be better to contact Elder Henghuo directly.

The phone was quickly connected.

Su Shi A Sixteen: "Good morning, Elder Henghuo, where are you and Elder Bai?"

Elder Henghuo: "Bai Dao friend made a mistake and sent us to Mars."

"Mars has a signal? Is it a new version of the modified phone?" Song Shuhang leaned over to A Sixteen's phone and asked.

Elder Henghuo: "No, we are currently in Bai Dao's secret base on Mars. The phone only has a signal within this base range. We will return to Earth at noon, and Bai Dao is conducting some experiments now."

"Okay, Elder. See you at noon." Su Shi A Sixteen replied.

"Ran off to Mars, huh? Bai Elder must have made some kind of mistake to send both of you to Mars." Song Shuhang was both laughing and crying.

Su Shi A Sixteen put away her phone: "So what should we do this morning?"

Song Shuhang thought for a moment: "Hey, since we have some free time, why don't we go find Prince Hai?"

"Prince Hai? Who's that?" Turtle Elder asked.

Cabbage Nanny: "Song Shuhang's lifelong enemy, now he should be at the Five-Grade Spirit Emperor Realm."

Turtle Elder rolled his eyes.

"That's the one who got the inheritance of the Demon Emperor, He Zhi, and has extremely good strategic abilities, but his luck isn't very good." Song Shuhang said.

"You're really going to bully that demon cultivator?" Red Sky Sword Elder asked.

Song Shuhang: "I have a feeling he'll give me a surprise. Maybe I can get the 'Heart Demon Calamity' from him too."

Su Shi A Sixteen asked: "Shuhang, do you know where Prince Hai is?"

Song Shuhang: "Hehe, I had a dream about him yesterday, and I got some information."

Su Shi A Sixteen nodded: "Then let's go find him. It's seven o'clock now, we should hurry... Bai Elder and the others might return at 11 or 12 o'clock."

"I'll leave some things behind." Song Shuhang opened the storage box in the room and put in a 'Gem Fruit', a 'Stone Milk' from the Black Dragon World, and ten 'Sword Intent Through Lotus Seeds'.

Cabbage Nanny: "What's the point of putting these things in the storage box? Why don't you let me eat them?"

"These are for Little Qian." Song Shuhang gently patted Cabbage Nanny's onion tip.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

然后他给小彩发了条短信，告诉她自己在药师大楼里给她留了化形的宝物，让她抽空来一趟。
小彩最近一直在暗中保护着宋书航的父母，监视有没有心怀不轨的道友接近父母。到目前为止，还没有发生异状。
准备妥当后，宋书航抱起缩小后的龟前辈，将葱娘塞入口袋，然后和苏氏阿十六一起离开药师大楼。
刚一踏出家门时，宋书航就看到一对学生模样的情侣，正在药师大楼前不远处，似乎发生了争吵。
“小姿，你相信我。我和其他女人只是逢场作戏，我真正爱的人只有你一个。”那位男子一脸认真道。
呸，竟然是个情场老手。
而且这台词是哪部电视剧的？他差点以为是自家功德蛇美人跑出来抢人台词来着。
“嗯……这家伙我揍过。换了个发型，差点认不出来。”苏氏阿十六突然传音道。
宋书航轻轻一笑，不由回忆起和苏氏阿十六初见的场面。
而这时，那男子正好看到宋书航身边的苏氏阿十六。他脸色微微一变，然后又认真的对女友道：“我心中只有你，相信我，我绝对不会辜负你。如若我心中还有其他女人，天打五雷轰！”
“这家伙在说谎。”心理说大师龟前辈传时道。
“那就配合他一下吧？”宋书航道。
他双指轻轻搓动，施展了他目前唯一会的《天师正法》雷法，引雷篇，一雷。
轰～
一道雷鸣在空中炸响。
宋书航借机，顺手牵住苏氏阿十六的小手，向远处行去，深藏功与名。

一道雷鸣在空中炸响。
宋书航借机，顺手牵住苏氏阿十六的小手，向远处行去，深藏功与名。assistant

Then he sent a text message to Xiao Cai, telling her that he had left a transformed treasure in the pharmacist building for her, and asked her to come over as soon as possible.

Xiao Cai had been secretly protecting Song Shu Hang's parents, monitoring whether any unscrupulous friends were approaching the parents. So far, there had been no unusual occurrences.

After preparing, Song Shu Hang picked up the shrunk turtle elder, put the onion into his bag, and left the pharmacist building with Su Shi A Shí.

As soon as they stepped out of the door, Song Shu Hang saw a young couple in front of the pharmacist building, arguing about something.

"You believe me, I only acted with other women on stage, and my true love is only you." The man said seriously.

Ugh, he's an old hand at love affairs.

And this line of dialogue is from which TV drama? He almost thought that his own virtuous snake beauty had come out to steal the line.

"Yes... I've beaten him up before. He changed his hairstyle and I almost couldn't recognize him." Su Shi A Shí suddenly transmitted a voice message.

Song Shu Hang smiled lightly, and couldn't help but recall the scene when he first met Su Shi A Shí.

At this time, the man happened to see Su Shi A Shí by Song Shu Hang's side. His face changed slightly, and then he seriously told his girlfriend, "I only have you in my heart, believe me, I will never betray you. If I had other women in my heart, heaven would strike me down!"

"This guy is lying." The turtle elder transmitted a voice message.

"Then let's cooperate with him?" Song Shu Hang said.

He lightly rubbed his fingers together, and used his only known technique, the "Tian Shi Zheng Fa" thunder law, to summon a thunder, the first part, one thunder.

Boom!

A thunderclap exploded in the air.

Song Shu Hang took advantage of the situation, and casually took Su Shi A Shí's small hand, walking away into the distance, hiding his abilities and fame.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

99、格杀勿论第1更
他虽然防御值极高，可子弹打中他，还是会受伤会死人的！
现在，还是热武器的统治时代，C级之下，没有任何一个觉醒者可以绕过这个存在。
所以吕树觉得这仨人虽然刚才在大桥上配合默契打出过一次绝杀，可依旧很蠢。
就算你多么想要无法无天的肆意妄为，也得等C级之后啊！
洛城面对这三位觉醒者的准备之充分，足以让吕树心惊，两名D级地网战斗人员带队，还有14名E级负责守住南部交通要道排查，然后这边又有如此多的武警在此待命，不得不说他们对于这件事情是非常重视的。
两名修行者在大桥上遭遇不测这件事情吕树是这样想的：虽然天罗地网准备很充分，很早以前就开始布局，但关键是，他们也没有觉醒者供他们频繁练手啊。
就看梁澈的待遇，也就是打了麻醉针带走，后期指不定是要吸纳进天罗地网的，这已经算是非常人道了啊。
反过来说，局面控制的很好就意味着，天罗地网的一些战斗人员恐怕也没有经历过什么真正的战斗，他们令行禁止配合默契，可他们也会有失误的时候。
这都是很正常的事情。
要是在灵气复苏初期忽然蹦出来一支面对觉醒者和修行者都堪称战斗经验丰富的队伍，鬼才知道在这之前他们是拿谁练手的？
部队里在面对真正战争时也有练兵一说，能经历过一轮战火洗礼的，那才算是可堪大用的老兵。
然而现在是和平年代啊。
或许边境线上也有入选天罗地网的老手，但这种比例与全军相比，恐怕是寥寥无几的。
这件事情吕树还真的没有猜错，那些真正经历过火与血并且还有资质的战士，早就成了各方争抢的资源。聪明人都会明白，有没有经历过血的考验，完全是两种不同的状态。
此时，他们身后被甩开的天罗地网作战人员已经追了上来，吕树只能更加隐匿自己的身形，并且随时准备开启星辰纱衣跑路模式。
那名力量型觉醒者扛着两个同伴躲藏在建筑立面头都不敢露，生怕有狙击手在这里埋伏，一枪了断了他的性命。
可是他也不能坐以待毙啊，如果真的让正在赶来的那群修行者包围，恐怕就真的难逃升天了，要知道，那支队伍里有两个D级的修行者！

99, Massacre Without Mercy Chapter 1

Although his defense value is extremely high, he will still be injured or killed if he is hit by a bullet.

Now, it's still the era of dominance by hot weapons, and below C-level, no awakened person can bypass this existence.

So, Lu Shu thought that these three people, although they had cooperated perfectly on the bridge earlier and had once killed with absolute certainty, were still very stupid.

Even if you want to engage in lawless and arbitrary behavior, you still have to wait until you reach C-level!

The city of Luo is facing these three awakened people's preparations, which are sufficient to make Lu Shu's heart tremble. There are two D-level net fighters leading the team, and 14 E-level personnel responsible for guarding the southern transportation hub, and then there are many police officers waiting here, which is to say that they are very serious about this matter.

Lu Shu thought about the two cultivators who encountered misfortune on the bridge: although the Heavenly Net has made very thorough preparations, it's been set up a long time ago, but the key is that they don't have any awakened people to frequently practice with.

Just look at Liang Che's treatment, which is to be knocked out with a sedative and taken away later, and who knows if he will be absorbed into the Heavenly Net later, which is already very humane.

On the other hand, the fact that the situation is under control means that some of the Heavenly Net's combat personnel may not have experienced any real battles. They work in perfect coordination, but they will also make mistakes.

This is all normal.

If, in the early stages of spiritual energy recovery, a team suddenly emerges that is capable of facing awakened people and cultivators alike, with rich combat experience, who knows what they were practicing with before?

In the army, there is also the concept of training for real war, and those who have experienced a baptism by fire are considered seasoned veterans.

However, now it's a peaceful era.

Perhaps there are some old hands on the border line who have been selected for the Heavenly Net, but this proportion is probably negligible compared to the entire army.

Lu Shu's guess was not wrong, those who have truly experienced fire and blood and have the talent, have long since become a coveted resource. Intelligent people will understand that whether or not someone has experienced the test of blood is a completely different state.

At this time, the Heavenly Net personnel who were left behind and chased after them have caught up, and Lu Shu can only become more stealthy and prepare to activate the Starlight Shawl escape mode at any time.

The power-type awakened person is hiding behind the building facade with his two companions, not daring to show his head, fearing that there may be snipers hiding here, waiting to take his life with a single shot.

However, he can't just sit back and wait to be surrounded by the approaching cultivators, because if he really lets them surround him, he might really be doomed to ascend to heaven, knowing that the team has two D-level cultivators!

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

顿时，这名觉醒者做出生死抉择，他竟是将两名同伴举过头顶，以同伴的身躯作为盾牌来防止自己被枪械击毙，然后迅速的向着西南方斜插进去，那边有庞大的建筑群，如果他能顺利钻进去，那就还有机会以身体素质的优势逃命！
两个同伴又惊又怒，他们怎么都不会想到，早上还口口声声说要一起亡命天涯、等逃出包围就一起凭借觉醒力量闯荡天下的同伴，竟然在他们还活着的情况下选择拿他们挡枪！
一时间咒骂声撕裂夜晚，如同饿狼临死前的哀嚎。
所有人都惊了，哪怕是正在追杀这名觉醒者的人，好像都没有直面过如此惨烈的人性！
这名觉醒者……在觉醒前到底是个什么样的人？杀人犯？惯犯？
这种感觉让所有人忽然想起那些新闻里报道过的灭门惨案凶手，极端的冷血与残酷。
而吕树更惊，这货特么逃跑的路线，竟然是自己的藏身之处！这尼玛！吕树急速向后退去，然而还没退多远，那名觉醒者已经在枪林弹雨中闯进了这条小路！
此时他的两名同伴已经有一个死的没法更惨了，而另一个还在喘息，血沫不停的从口中涌出。
让吕树更惊讶的一幕发生了，这名觉醒者竟生生拗断了那个还活着的同伴脖子。
这么做，是怕同伴侥幸活下来报复他吗？
这让吕树忽然明白，自己还是低估了这未来世界的各种可能性，这扑面而来的血腥味道让吕树内心翻起滔天巨浪。
恐怕那些论坛上天天说着觉醒者无害论的人们看到这一幕，立马会转变立场吧！
一个暴徒骤然间获得了超越凡人的力量，很难想象到底会发生什么事情！
吕树继续往小路深处潜行，他并不想参与这场战斗，过来这么一趟也只是为了看看战况，方便战斗结束之后带着吕小鱼过来收集魂魄。
觉醒者快速朝着小路里面狂奔，而身后天罗地网的修行者已经从兵分几路如同扇形般包围过来。
所有看到另外两个逃犯尸体的人心中都有一股寒意，他们都意识到了对手有多么的凶狠与残忍。

Suddenly, this awakened person made a life-or-death choice, and to everyone's surprise, he used his two companions as human shields to protect himself from the hail of bullets. He then quickly sprinted towards the southwest, where a massive building complex stood. If he could successfully make it inside, he might still have a chance to escape using his physical abilities.

The two companions were shocked and enraged. They couldn't believe that their friend, who had been talking about running away together and exploring the world with their awakened powers, would choose to sacrifice them to save himself.

A chorus of curses filled the night air, like the howls of a dying wolf.

Everyone was stunned, including the people chasing the awakened person. No one had ever seen such brutal humanity before.

What kind of person was this awakened person before he gained his powers? A murderer? A habitual offender?

This realization made everyone think of the news reports about mass murderers, who were known for their extreme cold-bloodedness and cruelty.

Lü Shù was even more shocked. The awakened person's escape route was the same as his own hiding place! What the heck! Lü Shù quickly retreated, but before he could get far, the awakened person had already burst into the narrow alley, dodging bullets and bullets.

One of the two companions was already dead, and the other was struggling to breathe, with blood oozing from his mouth.

The next scene was even more shocking. The awakened person brutally snapped the neck of the still-living companion.

Was he afraid that his companion might survive and seek revenge?

This realization made Lü Shù understand that he had underestimated the possibilities of this new world. The stench of blood was overwhelming, and it sent waves of turmoil through his mind.

Those people who had been saying that awakened people were harmless on online forums would likely change their stance after seeing this.

A common thug had suddenly gained powers beyond those of ordinary humans, and it was hard to imagine what would happen next.

Lü Shù continued to sneak deeper into the alley, not wanting to get involved in the battle. He had come here to observe the situation, so he could bring Lü Xiǎo Yú back to collect souls after the battle was over.

The awakened person was rapidly sprinting towards the alley, while the cultivators behind him were closing in from all sides, forming a net-like formation.

Everyone who saw the two dead escapees felt a chill run down their spines, realizing just how ruthless and cruel their opponent was.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

“格杀勿论，”一名D级修行者冷声说道，他手中的长剑骤然青芒大放，修行者咬破舌尖一口鲜血喷了上去：“去！”
只见长剑在沾染鲜血后如同流星般向逃犯激射而去，而这名修行者神形骤然萎顿了几分，看样子这手段使用也是有代价的，但此时已经顾不上别的了，不使用底牌，怕是真的要让对方给跑了。
他们现在虽然是修行者，可在修行之前，大家接受的都是保家卫国的教育，别人亲切的称呼他们人民子弟兵，现在，这三个逃犯已经犯下了无可饶恕的罪行，如果让对方在自己手下跑掉，简直就是人生中难以洗刷的耻辱！
这一剑超出了他的能力范围，是天罗地网里最后一搏一命换命的手段，在自身安全情况下即便自己没有受伤，实力也要大大退步，而且自身元气根基都损毁了，此生再难有任何进展。
这是用一生的前途，换来的一剑！
这一剑宛如千钧雷霆般穿破空气射向前面正在逃命的逃犯，青色的流星在晦暗的小路中带起一线光明，照亮斑驳的屋墙，照亮年久失修的路灯，照亮了逃犯回头惊恐的眼神。
现在大部分的子弹都能超过音速，然而却很难看见子弹突破音障的景象，因为那一切发生在枪管之内。
当子弹在有水蒸汽的空气中飞行速度减速到音速以下时，子弹周围也会产生在高亚音速范围特有的气雾，继续减到中亚音速后就消失了。
而此时，青色的流星在空气里行成细密的音锥，白色的波纹向周遭排斥开来！这流星虽然还是没有子弹快，可声势却极大！
D级之所以被称为可以躲避热武器的级别，并不是说他比子弹还要快，意思只是他比大部分热武器使用者的瞄准速度和扣动扳机速度要快！
100、C级修行者第2更
青色流星在一刹那之间来到逃犯身前，逃犯也仅仅只是来得及规避自己致命部位的时间，便被这青色流星狠狠的击中。
然而D级力量型觉醒者的肉身力量确实强大，这青色流星竟然只是贯穿逃犯的左肋下方，甚至都没能穿透，紧紧的卡在了他的身体里。

当子弹在有水蒸汽的空气中飞行速度减速到音速以下时，子弹周围也会产生在高亚音速范围特有的气雾，继续减到中亚音速后就消失了。
而此时，青色的流星在空气里行成细密的音锥，白色的波纹向周遭排斥开来！这流星虽然还是没有子弹快，可声势却极大！
D级之所以被称为可以躲避热武器的级别，并不是说他比子弹还要快，意思只是他比大部分热武器使用者的瞄准速度和扣动扳机速度要快！
100、C级修行者第2更
青色流星在一刹那之间来到逃犯身前，逃犯也仅仅只是来得及规避自己致命部位的时间，便被这青色流星狠狠的击中。
然而D级力量型觉醒者的肉身力量确实强大，这青色流星竟然只是贯穿逃犯的左肋下方，甚至都没能穿透，紧紧的卡在了他的身体里。assistant

"A kill, no matter what," a D-level cultivator said coldly, his hand holding a long sword suddenly radiating a blue glow. He bit his tongue, spitting out a mouthful of fresh blood: "Go!"

The long sword, now stained with blood, shot towards the fugitive like a meteor. The cultivator's body suddenly weakened, as if this technique came at a cost. However, he didn't have time to think about it now. If he didn't use his trump card, he might let the fugitive escape.

Although they were cultivators, they had all received the education of protecting their homeland before they started their cultivation journey. Now, these three fugitives had committed an unforgivable crime. If they let the fugitive escape, it would be a lifelong shame.

This sword strike was beyond his capabilities, a desperate attempt to save the situation. Even if he didn't get hurt, his strength would be greatly reduced, and his internal energy would be severely damaged. He would never be able to progress again in this life.

This sword strike was like a thunderbolt, piercing through the air and heading straight for the fugitive. The blue meteor illuminated the dark alley, shining on the worn-out walls and the broken streetlights. The fugitive's terrified eyes were filled with a desperate fear.

Most bullets can exceed the speed of sound, but it's hard to see them break through the sound barrier because everything happens inside the barrel.

When a bullet flies through the air with water vapor, its speed slows down below the speed of sound. At this point, a unique fog forms around the bullet in the high supersonic range. As it slows down to the middle supersonic range, the fog disappears.

However, the blue meteor in the air formed a fine sonic cone, and a white wave of pressure radiated outward. Although the meteor was not as fast as a bullet, its impact was immense.

D-level cultivators are known for their ability to dodge heat-based weapons, not because they are faster than bullets, but because they are faster than most heat-based weapon users in terms of aiming and firing speed.

The blue meteor arrived in an instant, and the fugitive barely had time to dodge before it struck him. However, the D-level cultivator's physical strength was indeed powerful, and the blue meteor only pierced through the fugitive's left side, not even breaking through. It was stuck tightly in his body.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

逃犯的身体被巨大的惯性向后带去，竟是撞向了后面的一面围墙，围墙轰然倒塌！而力量系D级觉醒者的肉身确实远超常人，即便中了这一剑，也没有被打进濒死状态，而是挣扎着要起身继续逃命！
就在这个时候，围墙倒塌之时显露出后面一身星辰纱衣遮挡住全身模样的吕树……
“如果我说我是出来散步的，你们大概不会信吧……”
所有人都有些惊疑不定，这面墙壁之后怎么会突然出现个人来，这一身星辰之力包裹之下明显就是个觉醒者之类的存在，谁会相信他是刚巧路过？
场中情况瞬间诡异起来，吕树在前，逃犯在中间，而天罗地网的修行者则身处后面正以扇形包围过来。
逃犯暴吼一声便要从吕树这边突围，对于他而言已经没有什么可思考的了，只要挡在前面的人就必须杀掉，不然一样是死路一条。
吕树所站的位置太过尴尬，就算他再怎么表达自己不会出手，恐怕逃犯也要忌惮两人擦肩而过时吕树会从背后偷袭。
所以逃犯做出了唯一的选择，杀！
他犹如回光返照般血色上涌至全身，竟爆发出全盛时期的状态来。
“不好，他又要觉醒！”
“当场格杀！”
“抓住那个可疑人物！”
此时逃犯已经一跃而起，一拳朝吕树砸来，谁也没想到这名逃犯在连续觉醒三次之后竟然在这种时刻再次出现觉醒预兆！
如果真的让他觉醒，谁也不知道到底会发生什么，C级力量系觉醒者？那是个什么样的存在？
而且墙壁后面出现的这人首先能确定不是来帮助逃犯的，不然那就是自相残杀了，可是莫名其妙出现在这里的人，必须带回去问清楚才行！
此时逃犯的力量正在快速增长着，他身上的血肉开始愈合，身体里那柄剑便像是长在他身体里一样，伤口已经不再流血了。
天罗地网的修行者看到这一群顿时震撼莫名，力量系觉醒者的战斗总是有种大道至简的感觉在里面，似乎一切都能以力破之！
对面的那个人……可能会死吧？！起码他们之间，没有人敢说自己能够接下这一拳的！

result:
system

The fugitive's body was pulled backward by the massive inertia, and he crashed into the rear wall, causing it to collapse in a loud explosion. However, the physical body of a D-level awakened person was indeed far superior to that of an ordinary person, and even after being hit by this sword, he did not fall into a life-threatening state, but instead struggled to get up and continue fleeing.

At this moment, when the wall collapsed, a figure in a starry cloak appeared behind it, covering his entire body. 

"If I say I was just out for a walk, you probably won't believe me, right?"

Everyone was somewhat uncertain and suspicious, as no one would believe that a person would suddenly appear behind the wall, especially one who was clearly an awakened person, wrapped in a starry power. 

The situation in the scene suddenly became bizarre, with Lyu Shu in front, the fugitive in the middle, and the practitioners of the Heavenly Net behind, closing in on him in a fan-shaped formation.

The fugitive let out a fierce roar and tried to break through from Lyu Shu's side, as he had no time to think anymore. As long as the person in front of him was still alive, he would have to kill him, or else he would be walking into a dead end.

Lyu Shu's position was too awkward, even if he expressed his intention not to intervene, the fugitive would still be wary of Lyu Shu's potential sneak attack from behind when they passed each other.

So the fugitive made the only choice he had, which was to kill.

He burst into a state of full power, with blood surging to his entire body, and suddenly unleashed his full strength.

"It's not good, he's going to awaken again!"

"Kill him on the spot!"

"Grab that suspicious person!"

At this moment, the fugitive had already jumped up and swung a punch at Lyu Shu, and no one had expected that this fugitive, who had awakened three times in a row, would suddenly show signs of awakening again at this moment!

If he really awakened, no one knew what would happen, a C-level power awakened person? What kind of existence would that be?

And the person who appeared behind the wall could not be confirmed to be helping the fugitive, otherwise it would be a case of mutual slaughter. However, the person who appeared out of nowhere must be brought back to be questioned.

The fugitive's power was rapidly increasing, and his wounds were healing, with the sword inside him seeming to grow out of his body. The wounds had stopped bleeding.

The practitioners of the Heavenly Net were shocked and stunned, as the battles of power awakened people always had a sense of simplicity and directness to them, as if everything could be broken with brute force.

The person on the other side... might die? At least, no one dared to say that they could take that punch!

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

然而就在逃犯刚刚跃起的刹那间，吕树左脚向后小撤了半步，以稳固的身形支撑起了整个身体的力量，然后一拳轰向迎面而来的暴徒！
世道艰难，未知世界在眼前血腥展开。
吕树哪怕学会了修行也从来没有想过自己会在某一天直面如此惨烈与杀气浓郁的战斗，想的最多的还是如果以后变强了，要带吕小鱼去哪里玩。
可现在他别无选择。
就像是当初他从孤儿院出来苦苦挣扎生存一样，就像是他蹲在小锅旁边卖白水煮鸡蛋一样，吕树的人生好像从来都缺少了太多选择的权力。
可是他的心里唯有三个字，活下去。
认真的活下去！
他不是什么不自量力的蠢货，既然选择跟来，吕树就应该有全身而退的底气！
顿时间脚与地合，腿与腰合，腰与臂合，臂与力合！
吕树这一拳，刚猛霸道如野兽本能般以下向上的姿态捶向迎来的暴徒。咔的一声，暴徒的手臂之内传出渗人的骨裂声响，像是寂静夜色里的催魂声音。
力气比吕树大的暴徒竟然在一拳相敌之下，输了！
这就是李弦一教给吕树的运力诀窍，这就是吕树每天汗流浃背也要形成自己本能的战斗技巧！
就这一刻而言，虽然吕树在星图修行上仍旧是E级，可他身体力量已经确确实实跨入了D级的初期门槛儿！而逃犯虽然有跨入C级的迹象，可他D级也不过是刚刚觉醒而已！
一个有技巧，一个无技巧，高下立判！
与此同时，尸狗小剑也从胸腔之内嘶吼亢奋着喷涌而出，闪电般斩向了天罗地网，黑玉剑身在黑暗里一闪而过显露痕迹，不是哑光色，而是带着血液的透亮晶莹！
这剑光没有伤人的意思，只是在身周划了一个巨大的圆弧，生生逼退了所有想要上前的觉醒者之后再次回归吕树的星图静静悬立，然后他再也没有恋战，吕树一脚将逃犯踹回人群里便转身没入黑暗的小路里，轻松跃上楼房消失不见。
所有人震惊的看着暴徒在地上挣扎起身想要继续逃跑，求生欲望何其执着，只是原本再次觉醒的预兆已经消散，是被彻底打散了！

system

However, just as the fugitive was about to jump up, Lu Shu took a half step back with his left foot, stabilizing his body and then punched the approaching thug with a firm stance!

The world is harsh, and the unknown world unfolds in front of us with bloodshed.

Lu Shu never thought that even if he learned to cultivate, he would one day face such a brutal and intense battle. He thought more about what he would do if he became stronger in the future, such as taking Lu Xiaofeng to play somewhere.

But now, he had no choice.

Just like when he first left the orphanage and struggled to survive, or when he sold boiled eggs by the small pot, Lu Shu's life seemed to have never had too many choices.

But in his heart, there were only three words: survive.

Seriously survive!

He was not a foolish and reckless person. Since he chose to come, Lu Shu should have the confidence to retreat unscathed.

In an instant, his feet connected with the ground, his legs connected with his waist, his waist connected with his arms, and his arms connected with his strength!

Lu Shu's punch was fierce and domineering, like a wild beast's instinct, and it struck the approaching thug with a downward motion. There was a loud crack, and a bone-crushing sound echoed from the thug's arm, like a soul-stirring voice in the quiet night.

The thug, who was stronger than Lu Shu, surprisingly lost to a single punch!

This was the secret to the power of force that Li Xuan had taught Lu Shu, and this was the fighting technique that Lu Shu had formed through his daily sweat and toil.

At this moment, although Lu Shu was still an E-level cultivator in the star chart, his physical strength had indeed crossed the threshold of the early stage of D-level! And the fugitive, although he had shown signs of entering C-level, his D-level was only just awakening!

One had technique, and the other did not. The difference was clear!

At the same time, the corpse dog, Xia Jian, also burst out of his chest, howling with excitement, and shot towards the heaven and earth net like lightning. The black jade sword flashed in the darkness, leaving a trail of blood and a transparent crystal-like glow!

This sword light did not intend to harm anyone, but instead, it drew a huge arc around Lu Shu's body, forcing back all the awakened individuals who wanted to approach him again. The star chart then quietly hovered around Lu Shu once more, and he no longer hesitated. Lu Shu kicked the fugitive back into the crowd and then disappeared into the darkness of the alleyway, easily jumping onto the rooftop and vanishing.

Everyone was shocked, watching the thug struggle to get up and continue fleeing, driven by the desire to survive. However, the original awakening sign had already dissipated, and it was completely scattered!

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

直到此时，那一抹晶莹剑光飞走的惊鸿一瞥还留在他们的脑海里。
忽然有人想到，就凭刚才那一剑想杀这个暴徒恐怕轻而易举，对方仅仅用来挡住自己等人，怕是一开始就想要迅速脱离战场了！
场中还有一名D级修行者，其实他也有搏命的招数没用……不是来不及用，而是他不想用，毕竟不是谁都能无私到，可以无视自己的前途。
只是他不禁深思，对方御剑手段纯熟，完全不像自己等人需要自损1000才能释放一击，这难道是一个C级修行者？
即便自己真的上去搏命了，就能留下对方吗？自己需要玩命一搏的攻击，对方已经运用纯熟了啊！这就是D与C的差距！
逃犯最终是死亡了，那青色流星一击便要了他的半条命，之后所发生的一切都只是他求生本能激发出觉醒前兆所带来的支撑而已，一旦觉醒失败，就意味着他再也不可能抗住那巨大的伤势。
战斗结束了，三名逃犯均已死亡，可这一夜留给大家的震撼实在太多了一些。
而那个忽然出现，然后迅速消失的修行者，在所有人脑中挥之不去。
洛城……什么时候出现了这么一个C级修行者？！

Until this moment, the fleeting glimpse of the crystal-like sword light still lingered in their minds. 

Suddenly, someone thought, relying on that one sword to kill this villain would probably be a piece of cake, and the other party had only used it to block them, probably wanting to quickly leave the battlefield from the start!

In the scene, there was also a D-level cultivator, who actually had a desperate move that wasn't used... not because it was too late to use, but because he didn't want to use it. After all, not everyone can be selfless enough to ignore their own future.

However, he couldn't help but think deeply, the other party's sword techniques were extremely skilled, completely unlike the need for themselves to suffer a 1000 damage to release a strike. Could this be a C-level cultivator?

Even if he really went up to fight with his life on the line, could he leave the other party behind? He needed to use a desperate attack, but the other party had already used it skillfully! This was the difference between D and C!

The fugitive ultimately died, and the blue meteor strike had taken half of his life. Everything that happened afterwards was just a support brought about by the premonition of awakening, which was triggered by his survival instincts. If the awakening failed, it would mean that he could no longer withstand the massive injuries.

The battle was over, and all three fugitives had died. However, the shock left for everyone that night was too much.

And that mysterious cultivator who suddenly appeared and quickly disappeared, was still lingering in everyone's minds.

Lo City... when did a C-level cultivator appear there?!

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

第271章 你从来都不是一个人，你还有我（1）
“当时你正好和我们这一伙人打球回来，那么多人，校花一点都没畏缩，对你说了很多很多的话，甚至连你们的将来她都规划好了，听着挺美的，而且你们郎才女貌，也挺配的，说句真心话，当时我对校花也有那么点意思，窈窕淑女君子好逑嘛，但是我当时都觉得你们好般配，蛮喜欢你们可以在一起的，我想那个时候，很多人也都是这么想的，但是那天，你在校花说了那么多话后，却回了她一句，对不起。”
“校花问你为什么拒绝她，你当时怎么说的来着？”
韩知返歪着脑袋，仔细的想了一会儿，然后才出声：“……过去这么多年，你那句话，我记得很清楚，你说，一个人之所以单身，?大概是心里有个不可能的人，或者有个不会再回头的人。”
那个时候，他一直以为，贺季晨只是随口拈来一句话，来解决掉校花的纠缠。
那天，贺季晨回到宿舍，一个人沉默良久，直到第二天天亮都没再吭过声。
他以为他是被人告白了，搞得情绪不好，直到现在，他才知道，贺季晨不是情绪不好，而是那句话，戳疼了他的心。
想着，韩知返又开了口：“所以……她呢？这个让你这些年来一直都孑然一身的女二号，在你心底到底是个不可能的人，还是一个不会再回头的人？”
贺季晨盯着杯中晶莹剔透的液体，神情淡淡的看了良久，才抬头，看了一眼韩知返，出声说：“不可能的人。”
说着，贺季晨就垂了眼帘，有着无数伤感从他眉骨之间流露而出，他再开口的声音很轻，却藏着浓烈的化不开的悲痛：“但凡是有点可能，只要是她，我都会毫不犹疑的回头，只是她，从来都没给过我这点可能……”
顿了顿，贺季晨又出声：“……也没想过要给我这点可能。”
室内的气氛，一瞬间变得有些沉重。
两个人默默无言了良久，直到杯中的酒，快要喝尽时，韩知返才清了清嗓音，再次开口，找了个自己比较感兴趣的事情，转移了话题：“对了，今天给女二号处理伤口，后来又给你处理伤口的那个女孩，是你们剧组随行的医生？”
“不是，是编剧，程未晚。”

result:
system

Chapter 271 You've never been alone, you've always had me (1)

"When you came back from playing with us, there were so many people, but you didn't flinch at all. You told her so many things, even planning out your future together. It sounded beautiful, and you two were a perfect match. To be honest, I had a bit of a crush on her too, but I thought you two were a great match. I liked seeing you two together. I think a lot of people thought the same way back then. But that day, after you told her so many things, you just said'sorry.'"

"What did you say to her when she asked why you rejected her?"

Khan Zhi returned with a tilted head, thinking carefully for a moment before speaking up. "......It's been so many years, but I remember what you said very clearly. You said that a person is probably single because they have someone in their heart who is impossible, or someone who won't come back."

At the time, he thought that He Jichen was just saying something casual to get rid of the girl's advances.

That night, He Jichen returned to the dormitory, silent for a long time, not speaking a word until the next morning.

He thought he was just upset because someone had confessed to him, but it wasn't until now that he realized that He Jichen's words had actually hurt his heart.

Khan Zhi thought for a moment before speaking up again. "So... what about her? The girl who has been single all these years, is she someone who is impossible, or someone who won't come back?"

He Jichen looked at the cup of liquid in front of him, his expression calm as he gazed at it for a long time before looking up at Khan Zhi. "She's impossible."

He Jichen's voice was low, but it was filled with a deep, unshakeable pain. "If there was even a little bit of possibility, as long as it was her, I would turn back without hesitation. But she's never given me that possibility... and she's never even thought about giving me that possibility."

The atmosphere in the room became heavy for a moment.

The two people were silent for a long time, until the wine in the cup was almost gone. Khan Zhi finally cleared his throat and changed the subject. "By the way, the girl who helped you with your wound today, and also helped me with mine, is she the medic from your production team?"

"No, she's the screenwriter, Cheng Weiwen."

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

“程未晚，她就是《三千痴》的作者？这么年轻啊，不对啊，她不是写书的吗？怎么会医啊？”
“哦，她父亲叫程卫国。”
程卫国？韩知返的指尖，蓦地握紧了高脚杯，开口的声调，略显的有些激动：“程卫国？你是说，她父亲就是那个全球闻名的医术大师，程卫国？”
贺季晨轻点了点头，干脆利索的回了一个字：“对。”
第272章 你从来都不是一个人，你还有我（2）
随着贺季晨话音的落定，韩知返忽然就将高脚杯重重的放在了茶几上。
贺季晨蹙了蹙眉心，转头纳闷的看了一眼韩知返：“怎么了？”
韩知返没说话，盯着高脚杯的眼神，却变得有些狠厉。
程卫国……即使这三个字，化成灰，他也能认得出来。
他永远都忘不掉，那个衣冠楚楚的男人，到底做过怎样肮脏而又下贱的事！
原来，今天他留意到的这个看起来让他很舒心的女孩，就是程卫国的女儿呀？
听说，程卫国膝下就这么一个女儿，宝贝疼爱的厉害。
贺季晨眉心蹙的更厉害了一些：“到底怎么了？”
韩知返回神，他意识到自己的失态，急忙压下眼底露出的情绪，抬头，冲着贺季晨一如既往的温润一笑：“没什么，就是被惊到了，没想到你的剧组里，居然是这么的卧虎藏龙！”
贺季晨信了韩知返，没再说话。
韩知返看贺季晨神情如常，没察觉到自己的异样，定下了心，然后就垂下眼帘，遮掩住自己眼底克制不住又翻滚而起的情绪。
程卫国，程未晚，程未晚，程卫国……
他在心底反反复复的将这两个人的名字念了好几遍，念到最后，竟念出了咬牙切齿的恨意和狠意。
他这一辈子，都不可能会放过程卫国，或者说，他一直都在找一个机会，一个可以让程卫国生不如死的机会……程未晚的出现，好像就是他的机会。
想到这里，韩知返彻底没了继续赖在贺季晨房间的意思，“时间也不早了，我回我房间休息了。”
贺季晨微微颔首，没留韩知返，但在他起身的那一刻，他忽然像是想起什么一样，喊住了韩知返：“对了。”
“恩？”韩知返停下所有动作，望向了贺季晨。

Khan knew that it wasn't late yet, but he couldn't help but wonder if the young woman in front of him was the author of "Three Thousand Obsessions"? She was so young, and yet she was a writer? How could she be a doctor?

"Oh, her father is Cheng Wei Guo," He Jichen replied.

Cheng Wei Guo? Khan's fingers tightened around the high cup, and his voice trembled with excitement: "Cheng Wei Guo? You mean, her father is the world-renowned master of medicine, Cheng Wei Guo?"

He Jichen nodded, his expression calm and collected: "Yes."

As soon as He Jichen finished speaking, Khan suddenly slammed the high cup onto the coffee table.

He Jichen raised an eyebrow, looking at Khan with a mixture of confusion and concern: "What's wrong?"

Khan didn't say a word, but his gaze was fixed on the high cup, his eyes burning with a fierce intensity.

Cheng Wei Guo... even if those three words were reduced to ashes, he would still recognize them.

He would never forget the elegant man, who had done such despicable and shameful things.

It turned out that the girl he had been watching, who seemed so innocent and harmless, was actually Cheng Wei Guo's daughter?

He Jichen's brow furrowed even deeper: "What's wrong?"

Khan's expression returned to normal, and he forced a smile onto his face: "Nothing, I was just surprised. I didn't expect your crew to have such hidden talents."

He Jichen believed him, and didn't say another word.

Khan looked at He Jichen's calm expression, and realized that he had lost control for a moment. He quickly suppressed his emotions, and looked up at He Jichen with a smile: "I'll go back to my room and rest."

He Jichen nodded, and didn't stop Khan.

As Khan turned to leave, he repeated the names in his mind: Cheng Wei Guo, Cheng Wei Guo, Cheng Wei Guo... until he felt a burning hatred and a fierce determination.

He had been searching for an opportunity to make Cheng Wei Guo suffer for his entire life. And now, with Cheng Wei Guo's daughter appearing, it seemed like the perfect chance.

Khan's mind was made up, and he had no intention of staying in He Jichen's room any longer.

Just as he was about to leave, He Jichen suddenly called out to him: "Wait."

"En?" Khan stopped in his tracks, looking at He Jichen.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

贺季晨仰起头，将杯中的红酒喝得一干二净，然后才迎向韩知返的目光，语气淡淡的出声说：“最近我要留在剧组里，抽不开身，所以有件事，我需要拜托你。”
“什么事，你直接说就是了。”
“你回北京，帮我查一下，季忆三年前在哪个医院做过人流手术……”他在季忆的房间，亲耳听到千歌说她四年前做人流手术的时候，险些丧命，若是真像千歌说的那样，她恨他，不愿要他的孩子，怎么会那么凶险，难不成其中有什么他不知道隐情？
想着，贺季晨又补了句：“记得，我要最详细的情况。”
“好。”韩知返一口答应了下来，他看贺季晨没别的要嘱咐的了，便道了声“再见”，离开了。
门轻轻地被拉开，又轻轻地被关上，只留了贺季晨一人的套房里，顿时安静无比。
他靠着沙发，坐了良久，直到手机设定的睡眠时钟响起，他才起身，进了卧室。
因为手上有伤，贺季晨去洗手间，简单的洗漱了一下，就躺上了床。
身下压了一个硬物，有些不舒服，他蹙了蹙眉心，伸出手将硬物摸了出来，是贺余光的手机。

He Qiji Chen raised his head, finished the red wine in his cup, and then met the gaze of Han Zhifan with a faint tone, saying: "Recently, I need to stay in the crew, so I have something to ask you."

"What is it, just say it."

"You go back to Beijing, help me find out which hospital Season Yi had an abortion three years ago..."

He was in Season Yi's room, and he heard Qian Ge say that she almost died from an abortion four years ago. If what Qian Ge said was true, Season Yi would hate him and not want his child. Why would it be so dangerous? Was there something he didn't know about?

Thinking, He Qiji Chen added: "Remember, I want the most detailed information."

"Okay." Han Zhifan agreed immediately, looked at He Qiji Chen as if he didn't have anything else to ask, and said goodbye before leaving.

The door was opened and closed softly, leaving only He Qiji Chen alone in the suite, suddenly becoming extremely quiet.

He leaned against the sofa, sat there for a long time, until the phone's sleep alarm went off, he got up and went to the bedroom.

Because his hands were injured, He Qiji Chen went to the bathroom to wash his hands, washed his face simply, and then lay down on the bed.

Something hard was pressed under him, a bit uncomfortable, he furrowed his eyebrows, stretched out his hand to feel the object, and it was He Yuguang's phone.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

075- 死神的交易
“说吧，既然费尽心思把我引到这里，你想要在我身上得到什么，金钱？还是别的东西？”
“很快你就会知道了。”
青年笑了笑，做出一个请的手势，“先生，你的孩子们都在等着你呢，请跟我来——”
德拉米尼面无表情的站起身，刚想迈步，可突然脚下一软，差点摔倒在地。
“没关系，这只是震撼弹和麻醉药的副作用而已，过几天就消退了。”
青年提醒道，可丝毫没有想要上前扶一把的意思。
德拉米尼只得咬了咬牙，强撑着身体站起来，扶着墙壁走了出去。
一直走出了房门，德拉米尼才发现自己所在的位置竟然是一间套房的卧室，而此时已经来到了套房的客厅之中。
“教父！”
“教父大人！”
客厅中，两名年轻男子看到德拉米尼后连忙迎了上来，将他扶到沙发上坐下。
一时间，德拉米尼心中微微一暖，冲两人摇了摇头表示自己并没有事。
啪！
啪！
啪！
看到这一幕，青年的嘴角不禁挑起一抹嘲讽的笑意，慢条斯理的鼓掌道，“真是一幅父慈子孝的场景啊……我听闻在意大利有一种风俗——”
“意大利人认为：整个世界对于尚在认知过程中的儿童过于危险，于是为了能更好的教导儿童，必需让他们认两个父亲，于是就出现了教父这么一种称呼，不知你们是否也是如此？”
“没错。”德拉米尼闻言昂首道，“杰克和瑞恩都是为我而死的兄弟的孩子，由我亲手抚养长大，是我最信任的亲人和助手。”
“原来如此……”
青年嘴角的嘲讽更深了，他用夸张的肢体语言看向两人，“你们觉得呢，德拉米尼先生是你们最亲的人吗？”

“什么意思？”德拉米尼皱眉道。
“这些是之前的录音。”青年从口袋中掏出一支录音笔举在半空，同时轻轻按下开关。
顿时，录音笔播放了一段对话，都眼前的青年提问，两人回答，而有关的内容全是德拉米尼的各种秘密。
“你们……”只是听了一小段，德拉米尼眼中便闪过一丝杀意，刚想发怒，可一想到自己如今的处境，顿时苦笑一声，重重陷进沙发里。
这一次，他连挺直腰杆的力气都没了。

075 - The Deal with Death

"Come on, since you've gone to so much trouble to bring me here, what do you want from me? Money? Or something else?"

"You'll find out soon enough."

The young man smiled and made a gesture of invitation, "Sir, your children are waiting for you. Please, come with me..."

Drammini stood up expressionlessly, just about to take a step, but suddenly his legs gave way and he almost fell to the ground.

"It's okay, it's just a side effect of the stun gun and the sedative. It'll wear off in a few days."

The young man reminded him, but showed no intention of helping him up.

Drammini gritted his teeth and struggled to stand up, leaning on the wall to support himself as he walked out of the room.

It wasn't until he had walked out of the door that he realized he was in a suite's bedroom, and had somehow ended up in the living room.

"Father!"

"Father, sir!"

In the living room, two young men rushed over to Drammini as soon as they saw him, helping him sit down on the couch.

For a moment, Drammini's heart felt a warmth, and he shook his head to indicate that he was fine.

Slap! Slap! Slap!

As he watched this scene, the young man's lips curled up into a mocking smile, and he applauded slowly, "What a lovely scene of filial piety... I've heard that in Italy, there's a custom..."

"In Italy, people think that the world is too dangerous for children who are still in the process of learning, so they need to teach them better. Therefore, they need to let them recognize two fathers, and that's how the concept of a 'godfather' came about. Do you have the same custom?"

Drammini nodded, "That's right. Jack and Ryan are the children of my brother who died for me, and I've raised them myself. They're my most trusted family members and assistants."

"Ah, I see..."

The young man's mocking smile deepened, and he looked at the two young men with exaggerated gestures, "Do you think, Drammini, that you are the most important person to them?"

The young man who was called Jack and Ryan trembled all over and looked down.

"What do you mean?" Drammini furrowed his brow.

"These are recordings from before." The young man pulled out a recorder from his pocket and held it up, pressing the switch.

Suddenly, the recorder played a conversation between the young man and the two young men, with the content being Drammini's various secrets.

"You... " Drammini's eyes flashed with a hint of killing intent as soon as he heard a small part of the recording, and he was about to get angry, but then he thought about his current situation and couldn't help but laugh bitterly, sinking heavily into the couch.

This time, he didn't even have the strength to straighten up.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

“其实，你们如果想要活命的话，也是有机会的。”青年突然开口。
三人纷纷抬头。
青年笑了笑，从身后取出一把格洛克18C，倒提着枪柄，轻轻拎到三人面前。
众人的神色顿时闪了闪。
“难道看不出来吗？”
青年将手枪拎得更近一些，用一种低沉蛊惑的语气道，“你们只要抢过这把枪，对着我的脑袋——砰一声，你们就得救了！”
杰克和瑞恩两人互相对视一眼，都有些拿捏不准眼前青年的真实用意。
“怎么，不敢动手？难道是怕我身后的人？”青年故意朝身后看了一眼，对守在角落的手下说道，“程超，你先出去，没我的命令不许进来。”
“是，老板。”被称为程超的男子顿时拉开门，毫不犹豫地走出了房间。
“看，现在没人看管你们了。”
青年回过头，再次将枪拎近了一些，甚至怼到其中一名男子的脸上，“把它拿起来，快啊，像个男人。”
叫杰克的男子迟疑地接过了枪。
“好了，接下来，打开保险，对准我的眉心。”
青年握住杰克手中的枪杆，放在自己的眉心上，然后缓缓张开双手，双手手指不停地划动，以示自己毫无戒备。
杰克的眼神不断闪烁，似乎在犹豫着。
“开枪啊？”
青年笑得更加肆意了，一双眼睛如同漆黑的深渊，“你该不会还不敢开枪吧？开枪都没力气，还说是黑社会？”
可就在这时，拿枪的杰克突然神色一闪，闪电般打开了保险，同时重重扣下了扳机！
他之前的犹豫，竟然全是一种伪装！
可是，诡异的事情发生了！
就在他即将扣动扳机，将眼前怪异的青年彻底击毙的那一刻，他突然愣了愣。他只觉得，自己似乎失去了对自己右手的掌控。
“怎、怎么回事？”杰克错愕地望着自己的右手缓缓松开扳机，同时手肘一麻，手臂竟然自己缓缓抬了起来。
“杰克，你在做什么？”一旁的瑞恩惊讶道。
“我、我不知道！”杰克几乎快要哭出来了，他连忙伸出左手想按住右臂，可是左手才刚刚抬起，便再次垂落了下来。
左手也失控了！

"You want to live, you can still have a chance." The young man suddenly spoke up.

The three people looked up in unison.

The young man smiled and took out a Glock 18C from behind him, holding the gun by the barrel. He gently placed it in front of the three people.

The expressions of the crowd suddenly changed.

"Can't you see?" the young man asked.

He held the gun closer to them, his voice low and hypnotic. "You just grab this gun and point it at my head... Bang! You'll be saved!"

Jack and Ryan exchanged a glance, unsure of the young man's true intentions.

"Can't you do it? Afraid of what's behind me?" The young man deliberately looked back and said to the man standing in the corner, "Cheng Chao, go out first. No one is allowed to enter without my permission."

"Yes, boss," the man named Cheng Chao immediately opened the door and walked out of the room without hesitation.

"Now, no one is watching you," the young man said, turning back and holding the gun closer to them, even pressing it against one of the men's faces. "Pick it up, quickly, like a man."

The man named Jack hesitated and took the gun.

"That's it, now unlock the safety and aim at my forehead," the young man said, holding Jack's hand and placing the gun on his own forehead. He then slowly opened his hands, his fingers moving rapidly to show that he was unarmed.

Jack's eyes kept flashing, as if he was hesitating.

"Go ahead and shoot?" the young man laughed even more wildly, his eyes like a deep, dark abyss.

"You're not going to shoot? You're the Black Society, and you can't even shoot?" 

But just as Jack was about to pull the trigger and kill the young man, he suddenly flashed a look and quickly opened the safety, then pulled the trigger with all his might!

His previous hesitation was all an act!

But a strange thing happened!

Just as he was about to pull the trigger and kill the young man, Jack suddenly froze. He felt like he had lost control of his right hand.

"What...what's going on?" Jack looked at his right hand in shock as it slowly released the trigger and his elbow went numb, his arm slowly lifting up on its own.

"Jack, what are you doing?" Ryan exclaimed in surprise.

"I...I don't know!" Jack almost cried, trying to stretch out his left hand to grab his right arm, but his left hand only lifted up for a moment before falling back down.

His left hand was also out of control!

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

接下来，德拉米尼和瑞恩看到了这一辈子都无法忘记的画面——在众目睽睽下，杰克的手臂诡异地弯了回来，同时手腕翻转，将格洛克对准了自己的脑袋！
“快停下，杰克！”瑞恩高声叫道。
“我停不下来，来帮帮我！”杰克满脸惊恐，他不断扭着自己的腰和脖颈，试图躲闪转向自己的枪口，可是紧接着，他便失去了全身上下所有肢体的控制！
最终，在杰克惊恐绝望的目光中，自己手中那黑漆漆的枪口彻底对准了自己……
一声枪响，杰克的太阳穴上，顿时多出一道贯穿型弹孔，左右各一道。
一旁的瑞恩发出一声惊叫，怔怔望着这诡异的一幕，然而更诡异的事情出现了——在杰克的大脑被子弹搅成浆糊后，对方的身体竟依然稳稳站在原地!
不仅如此，对方甚至伸出手臂，将枪递到了瑞恩眼前。
“你是魔鬼！”瑞恩发出一声尖叫，他迅速夺过枪，就想朝眼前的青年射去！
可是下一秒，他发现自己的身体也不能动了……
砰！又是一声枪响，瑞恩也彻底垂下了脑袋，他的额头多出一颗拳头大小的弹孔，而他的手臂也诡异地伸了出来，将枪递到了德拉米尼眼前。
仿佛是一场死亡接力……
“巫术？还是某种高科技？”
德拉米尼瞪圆了眼睛，他不可思议的望着递到眼前的黑色手枪，却不由得再次想到自己和英德尔后颈处的伤口。
朝依然站在原地的杰克和瑞恩后脖颈处看了一眼，两人的脖颈上，同样有着一道细小的伤口。
果然……
只可惜，知道这些也已经迟了。
这时，德拉米尼发现自己已经失去了对身体的控制，就好像身体内住进了另一具灵魂，他只能眼睁睁看着对方接手自己的身体，拿起那把已经杀死了两个人的手枪，再次瞄准了自己的脑袋……
随着死亡临近，德拉米尼缓缓闭上了眼睛。
“咔嚓！”德拉米尼身体一震。
可是，预想中的死亡并没有到来，原来，那把枪内第三发子弹是空的。
“失误？不，对方本来就没想要杀我，不然绑架我的举动毫无意义……”

Next, Dralmi and Ryan witnessed a scene that they would never forget for the rest of their lives - in full view of everyone, Jack's arm eerily bent back, and his wrist flipped, pointing the Glock at his own head!

"Stop, Jack!" Ryan shouted loudly.

"I can't stop, help me!" Jack's face was filled with terror as he continued to twist his waist and neck, trying to dodge and turn away from his own gun, but then he lost control of his entire body!

Finally, in Jack's terrified and desperate gaze, his own gun was completely pointed at himself...

A gunshot rang out, and a bullet hole appeared on Jack's forehead, with two holes on either side.

Ryan let out a scream, staring at the bizarre scene in front of him, but even more bizarre things happened - after Jack's brain was blown to mush, his body still stood steadily in place!

Not only that, but he even stretched out his arm, handing the gun to Ryan.

"You're a devil!" Ryan shouted, quickly snatching the gun and aiming it at the young man in front of him!

But the next second, he discovered that his own body was also unable to move...

Bang! Another gunshot rang out, and Ryan's head hung down, with a bullet hole the size of a fist on his forehead, and his arm stretched out, handing the gun to Dralmi.

It was as if it was a relay of death...

"What's this, magic? Or some kind of high-tech?"

Dralmi's eyes widened in amazement as he stared at the black gun handed to him, but he couldn't help but think of the wound on the back of his neck and Indel's.

He looked at the back of Jack and Ryan's necks, and saw that they both had a small wound.

Of course...

But it was too late.

At this time, Dralmi discovered that he had lost control of his body, as if another soul had taken over, and he could only watch as the other person took over his body, picked up the gun that had killed two people, and aimed it at his own head again...

As death approached, Dralmi slowly closed his eyes.

"Click!" Dralmi's body shook.

But the expected death did not come, and it turned out that the third bullet in the gun was empty.

"Error? No, he didn't want to kill me in the first place, otherwise, the kidnapping would be meaningless..."

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

德拉米尼忍不住苦笑起来，自己竟然连这么基本的问题都忘记了，看来自己真的老了。
“感受如何？”身旁的青年依然用那淡然轻松的语气说道，“有没有一种重获新生的快感？”
“你就是个魔鬼！”德拉米尼重重瘫倒在地，疲惫道，“你赢了……我的骄傲、我的尊严，以及我的荣耀，都被你践踏得粉碎，你已经达到了你的目的！”直至此时，他再次恢复了对身体的控制权。
“德拉米尼先生言重了。”直至此时，青年似乎也终于认真了起来，他走到德拉米尼身前，居高临下道，“德拉米尼，我要借用你的一样东西……”
“你想要什么？”德拉米尼有气无力道。
“我想要借用你旗下的那座艾菲尔火力发电厂几天时间。”
“好的，那座艾菲尔发电厂是你的了。”德拉米尼毫不犹豫的说道，“还有呢？”
“抱歉，我想你可能是误会了什么。”
青年闻言，轻轻摇了摇手指，蹲下身道，“我可不需要你的发电厂的所有权，我说了，我只是‘借用几天’。”
“我懂你的意思……”
德拉米尼闻言，反倒摇了摇头，“没有用的，这家电厂可是供应着大半个开普敦市的电力，虽然电厂的所有权在我手上，可是我却没有权利将发出的电调往其它城市，市政厅也不会允许我这么做。”
“谁说我要将电调往其它地方？”
闻言，青年反而笑了起来，“你不需要关系电的去向问题，只需要帮我做一件事就够了。”
说着，青年转过身朝门外走去，边走边说道，“我需要你帮我挡住‘头顶上’的压力。”
“压力，你是说官方？”德拉米尼倒吸一口冷气。
“没错，我不管你用何种手段何种借口，你只要扛住电厂连续数天没有电抵达开普敦市的压力就足够了，只要你能做到，我保证你……”青年顿了顿，转身走出门外。“毫发无伤！”

system

Dramini couldn't help but laugh bitterly, having forgotten such a basic question. It seemed he was indeed getting old.

"How do you feel?" the young man beside him said with the same casual tone, "Is there a sense of rebirth?"

"You're a devil!" Dramini collapsed heavily to the ground, exhausted. "You've won... my pride, my dignity, and my glory have all been trampled to dust. You've achieved your goal!"

It wasn't until then that Dramini regained control over his body.

"Dramini sir is being too dramatic," the young man seemed to have finally taken things seriously, walking up to Dramini and looking down at him. "Dramini, I'd like to borrow something from you..."

"What do you want?" Dramini said weakly.

"I'd like to borrow your Eiffel power plant for a few days," the young man said.

"Fine, the Eiffel power plant is yours," Dramini said without hesitation. "What else?"

"Sorry, I think you might have misunderstood something," the young man said, shaking his head and squatting down.

The young man's words made Dramini shake his head. "No use, this power plant supplies half of Cape Town's electricity. Although the ownership is in my hands, I don't have the right to redirect the electricity to other cities, and the city hall won't allow me to do so either."

"Who said I want to redirect the electricity?" the young man said with a smile.

Dramini's words made the young man laugh. "You don't need to worry about where the electricity goes. You just need to do one thing for me."

The young man turned around and walked towards the door, saying, "I need you to block the pressure above your head."

"Pressure, you mean the official one?" Dramini took a deep breath.

"Yes, I don't care how you do it or what excuse you use. You just need to withstand the pressure of the power plant not supplying electricity to Cape Town for several days. If you can do that, I promise you... " The young man paused and walked out the door. "You'll be unscathed!"

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

第五十五章 编号27149
“上了这什么通缉任务榜，我的身份不是已经暴露了？”顾飞说。
“不要被人捉到就可以了。”佑哥说。
“名字不会被公布吗？”顾飞问。
“不会。”佑哥摇了摇头，“在通缉榜上列出来的人都会有一个编号，你现在的名字就是个通缉犯xxxx号。”
“这样啊……”
“领取了通缉任务的玩家，每五分钟任务列表里会更新一次你的坐标，所以，你只要计算好时间，每五分钟大转移一次，对方想找到你也没那么容易。”佑哥说。
“有道理啊！那我现在赶快动身吧！”顾飞看了看时间，上线已经快五分钟了。
“你要买什么？我帮你。”佑哥走向拍卖行交易窗口。
“哦，来件30级法师应该穿的长袍，然后看看有没有附火法攻击机率的项链、戒指还有纹章，一样来一个。”顾飞说。
佑哥面无表情地离开了交易窗口：“时间不早了，赶快上路吧！”
顾飞：“……”
出了拍卖行的两人快步朝城外走去。没走多远就听到身后一阵纷乱的脚步声，回头一看，数名玩家正朝着拍卖行冲去。
“不是冲我来的吧！”顾飞一惊。
“看起来是的。”佑哥说。
“人不少啊！”顾飞说。
“自首吧！”佑哥镇定地说。
“别……”顾飞说。
“那你还是把脸蒙着，这么多人，难保有哪个眼尖的不会发现你的存在。你现在在他们眼中是标着一个号码的，一目了然。”佑哥说。
“好好，先赶紧出城。城里人多眼杂，麻烦。”顾飞快步朝城外跑去，佑哥完全追不上顾飞的速度，只能在身后高呼了一声：“自己多小心。”
顾飞头也不回地朝他挥了挥手。
佑哥独自返身又来到拍卖行，为数众多的玩家正在这里进行搜查，还时不时地有新兵到达。佑哥觉得自己有些低估了情况的严重，他没想到顾飞可以招来这么多追捕的人。人类的好奇心真是太可怕了。
离开拍卖行后佑哥联系了韩家公子等人。众人听到这个消息都是狠狠吃了一惊：“啥？那家伙不知道pk规则？”
“这个废物！开会开会！”身为团长的韩家公子首先对顾飞进行了批评，接着招集众人小雷酒馆老地方见面。
与此同时，纵横四海的风行正飞奔着找到了他们的会长无誓之剑。
“机会来了！”纵横四海行会的大门几乎快被风行撞飞。

Chapter 55: Task ID 27149

"I've already blown my cover by being on this wanted list," said Gu Fei.

"Just don't get caught," said You Ge.

"Will my name be announced?" asked Gu Fei.

"No," said You Ge, shaking his head. "People on the wanted list are given a number, and you're now known as fugitive number xxxx."

"Oh, I see..."

"Players who accept the wanted task will have their coordinates updated every five minutes on the task list," said You Ge. "So, just calculate the time and move every five minutes, and it'll be harder for them to find you."

"That makes sense! I'll get moving right away!" said Gu Fei, looking at his time, which was almost up.

"You want to buy something? I'll help you," said You Ge, walking towards the auction house trading window.

"Oh, get me a long robe suitable for a 30-level mage, and see if there are any necklaces, rings, or seals with increased fire magic attack probability," said Gu Fei.

You Ge left the trading window without expression: "It's getting late, let's get moving!"

Gu Fei: "..."

The two of them quickly walked out of the auction house and towards the city gate. They hadn't gone far when they heard a commotion of footsteps behind them. They turned around to see several players rushing towards the auction house.

"Are they coming for me?" Gu Fei exclaimed.

"It looks like it," said You Ge.

"There are a lot of them!" said Gu Fei.

"Maybe you should surrender?" said You Ge calmly.

"No...," said Gu Fei.

"You should cover your face, it's hard to tell who might recognize you. You're now a number in their eyes, easy to spot," said You Ge.

"Okay, let's get out of the city first. There are too many people here, it's a hassle," said Gu Fei, quickly running towards the city gate. You Ge couldn't keep up with Gu Fei's speed and could only shout behind him: "Be careful!"

Gu Fei waved his hand without looking back.

You Ge returned to the auction house alone, where a large number of players were searching and new recruits were arriving. You Ge felt that he had underestimated the situation, and he didn't expect Gu Fei to attract so many pursuers. Human curiosity was indeed terrifying.

After leaving the auction house, You Ge contacted the Korean prince and others. When they heard the news, they were all shocked: "What? He doesn't know the PK rules?"

"This idiot! Let's have a meeting!" said the team leader, Korean prince, who immediately called a meeting at the old location, Small Leiyu Wine House.

Meanwhile, the windrunner was frantically searching for their leader, No Vow Sword. "This is an opportunity!" The windrunner almost crashed into the door of the Four Seas and Ten Thousand Miles Guild.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

无誓之剑正在和行会的几个小美眉交流感情，被风行突然打断，轻轻皱了眉，沉声道：“说过多少遍了，遇事要冷静，千万不要慌！”
“蒙面杀手被通缉了！”风行直接用喊。
“他砍了不笑那么多次，当然会被通缉。”无誓之剑淡淡地道，继续在美眉面前表现他的冷静，“走，我和你去看看。”
无誓之剑潇洒地扬手和几个美眉道了个别，沉稳地走出行会，轻轻地带上了房门，回身：“哇靠！！他怎么会被通缉的？砍了不笑那么多次，难道他没去自首坐牢吗？这样大家一追捕他，他的身份不就曝光了？之前蒙面还有什么意义？”
风行：“……”
“说啊你！”无誓之剑此时猴急的模样和之前在行会里时判若两人。
“我……我也不知道啊！我就听说通缉任务那边出了一个pk值15的犯人，我想除了这家伙没有别人了。”
“快去看看……”无誓之剑大步朝通缉任务发放处飞奔。
通缉任务发放窗口门庭若市。无誓之剑放眼一扫就看到了许多云端城其他行会的头头脑脑。这些人的心思无誓之剑可以猜到，无非就是想结交这个狠人，最好还能进一步拉进自己行会。其实无誓之剑心里也有这个打算，不过眼下倒不必想太多，这么多人，最终落到谁手还里还不一定呢！
无誓之剑转头在通缉榜上搜索。蒙面杀手的信息高挂于顶：pk值15，编号27149。
而此时还处在大厅里的人，都并不急于领取任务，他们都认为顾飞一定会来自首。而自首的地方同样是这个大厅，因此这些人都紧盯着进进出出的玩家，一发现是法师就两眼放光，接着又是一脸失望。
“怪不得没来自首，自首更是死路一条。”无誓之剑暗自嘀咕。进出的法师有不少了，编号27149依然高居榜首。
大厅的一角，七月、落落、烈烈三个姑娘也在观望着眼前的人流。
“啊，这个，一定是他！新手袍呀！！”烈烈已经是第十七次指着某个玩家嚷嚷了。
落落使用了一下鉴定术后，叹息道：“烈烈啊！高手不一定要很英俊，那只是你一厢情愿的想法罢了，你不要看到一个长得帅的法师就说是。你刚刚指的这个人才12级。”
“哦……”
“咱们在这里多长时间了？”七月问。
“差不多快半小时了。”落落说。

system

“哦……”

“差不多快半小时了。”落落说。assistant

The Unsworn Sword was chatting with a few young girls from the guild when Windrunner suddenly interrupted, slightly furrowing his brow and speaking in a low tone, "I've told you how many times, when faced with a situation, you must remain calm and not panic!"

"He's been wanted!" Windrunner shouted directly.

"He's killed Not Laughing that many times, of course he's been wanted," The Unsworn Sword said calmly, continuing to show his composure in front of the girls, "Let's go take a look."

The Unsworn Sword elegantly waved his hand to bid farewell to the girls, walked out of the guild, and lightly closed the door behind him, turning back to say, "What the...? How did he get wanted? He's killed Not Laughing that many times, didn't he just go to prison and confess? If we all chase after him, won't his identity be exposed? What's the point of him wearing a mask before?"

Windrunner:...

"Tell me!" The Unsworn Sword's current anxious expression was a far cry from his calm demeanor in the guild.

"I... I don't know either! I just heard that the task force had a PK value of 15, and I thought it was only this guy," Windrunner said.

"Go take a look..." The Unsworn Sword took a few big strides towards the task force dispatch window.

The task force dispatch window was bustling with people. The Unsworn Sword scanned the area and saw many leaders from other guilds in Cloud City. He could guess their intentions - they all wanted to befriend this ruthless person and possibly even bring them into their own guild. The Unsworn Sword had the same intention, but for now, he didn't need to think too much about it. With so many people, it was hard to say who would ultimately get their hands on him!

The Unsworn Sword turned his head to search for the wanted poster. The information about the Masked Assassin was prominently displayed at the top: PK value 15, ID 27149.

At the same time, the people still in the hall didn't seem to be in a hurry to take on the task. They all thought that Not Laughing would eventually surrender. The surrender area was also in this hall, so they all kept a close eye on the players entering and leaving, their eyes lighting up when they saw a mage, only to be disappointed again.

"Why hasn't he surrendered? Surrendering is a dead-end road," The Unsworn Sword muttered to himself. Many mages had entered and left the hall, but ID 27149 remained at the top of the list.

In a corner of the hall, the three girls, July, Lalo, and Lelie, were watching the crowd.

"Ah, that's him! Newbie robe!" Lelie exclaimed for the 17th time, pointing at a player.

Lalo used her identification skill and sighed, "Lelie, high-ranking players don't have to be handsome, it's just your one-sided wish. You shouldn't assume that just because someone is good-looking, they're a high-ranking player. The one you pointed out just now is only level 12."

"Oh..."

"How long have we been here?" July asked.

"About half an hour," Lalo replied.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

“难道这人不打算来自首？”七月道出了真相。
“不会吧？pk值15啊，那他要在外面漂30个小时的，中间不下线了？如果要下线，回下线区的路上就很可能被人发现，只要是领取了通缉任务的玩家，在安全区也一样可以攻击他。”落落说。
“那他怎么还不现身？”七月扫了一眼通缉榜。
“也许他也料到会有好多人等他过来自首，故意在哪个地方耗着吧！”落落说。
“哦！那再等等吧！”
所有人都是抱着这样的心思，耐心的等待着，直至一个小时过去。
“啊啊啊！这个这个……咦，是个牧师呀……”烈烈指着一个家伙又开始惊叫了。
落落追着烈烈的目光望去，眼睛一亮。
落落轻轻拉了拉两人，指了指那人，在她们耳边小声道：“这人就是韩家公子。”
韩家公子在任务大厅里转了一圈后，很快就离去了。落落拉了七月和烈烈，悄悄跟在了后面。
韩家公子一路走得很慢，过了两条街后，来到一个无人的所在，突然回头。三女飞快地缩入一旁角落。
“藏什么啊！出来吧，你们后面还有人盯着你们呢！”韩家公子喊道。
“别动，他肯定是在骗人。”烈烈说。
“他没骗人……”一个声音清晰地在三人身后响起。
三女目瞪口呆，烈烈回头看了一眼，更加茫然了：“你们听到有人说话了吗？”
七月已经站直了身子，望着身后的空气叹道：“是盗贼，潜伏在咱们身后呢！”
“可以出来了吗？”前面的韩家公子继续喊道。
三女无奈地走出角落。烈烈朝身后挥了几下拳脚，什么也没打到。
“够小心的啊！还安个眼睛在身后。”落落说。
韩家公子却对她爱理不理，只是冷冷地道：“我们的交易好像在昨天就已经结束了。”
“是结束了，但也许还会有新的交易可以做。”落落说。
“现在我们没空。”韩家公子说。
“哦，有什么事要忙？”落落问。
韩家公子笑了笑：“你说呢？”
“这事是因我们而起的，有什么需要帮忙的，我们不会推辞。”七月很诚恳地说。
“小姐，有关我们帮你做的一切，你已经付过我们报酬，价钱也很合理，所以我们根本互不相欠。现在已经完全是我们自己的事，用不着你来操心了。收起你们的好奇心，赶快回去吧！”韩家公子说完转身已经准备离开。
“韩家公子！！”烈烈突然喊。

result:
system

Seven months said the truth. 
"Are you kidding me? The PK value is 15, so he would have to stay outside for 30 hours without logging off. If he logs off, he would be discovered on the way back to the safe zone. Even if he received a bounty task, he could be attacked in the safe zone by players who received the bounty task." Lala said.

"How come he hasn't shown up yet?" Seven months scanned the bounty list.

"Maybe he also expected many people to wait for him to surrender, so he deliberately stayed in a certain place." Lala said.

"Oh, let's wait a bit longer!"

Everyone was thinking the same way, patiently waiting until an hour passed.

"Ahahah! This is a priest!" Lietie pointed to a guy and started screaming again.

Lala followed Lietie's gaze and her eyes lit up.

Lala gently pulled the two of them and pointed to the person, whispering in their ears: "That's the young master of the Han family."

The young master of the Han family walked around the task hall and left quickly. Lala pulled Seven months and Lietie and quietly followed behind him.

The young master of the Han family walked slowly, and after passing two streets, he came to a deserted place and suddenly turned around. The three girls quickly hid in a corner.

"What are you hiding for? Come out, you have people following you!" the young master of the Han family shouted.

"Don't move, he's definitely deceiving us." Lietie said.

"He's not deceiving us..." a clear voice echoed behind the three girls.

The three girls were stunned, Lietie looked back and was even more bewildered: "Did you guys hear someone talking?"

Seven months stood up straight, looking at the empty air and sighed: "It's a thief, hiding behind us!"

"Can we come out now?" the young master of the Han family continued to shout.

The three girls had no choice but to come out of the corner. Lietie swung his fists a few times, but nothing hit.

"He's very careful, even with his eyes in the back." Lala said.

However, the young master of the Han family ignored her and coldly said: "Our transaction seems to have ended yesterday."

"It's ended, but maybe there will be new transactions to do." Lala said.

"We don't have time now." The young master of the Han family said.

"What's going on?" Lala asked.

The young master of the Han family smiled: "You know."

"This matter is because of us, so if you need help, we won't refuse." Seven months said sincerely.

"Miss, regarding everything we've done for you, you've already paid us the compensation, and the price is very reasonable, so we don't owe each other anything. Now it's completely our own business, and we don't need you to worry about it. Please put away your curiosity and go back quickly!" The young master of the Han family said, turning to leave.

"Khan Jia gongzi!!" Lietie suddenly shouted.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

韩家公子停下脚步。
“我们知道你的名字，也知道你的模样，你不怕我们把你给说出去吗？”烈烈喊道。
“烈烈！”七月和落落显然都没想到烈烈会这么说。
“威胁我？”韩家公子回头。
“不是，我的意思就说，你的身份都可以让我们知道，为什么不能让我们见见其他人，我们一定会保守秘密啊！”烈烈说。
韩家公子笑了笑，指了指了七月说：“问你们会长吧！也许她会明白我的心思。”
七月愣了愣。
“不要再跟着我了。我脾气不好，现在心情也不好，很容易翻脸的。最后友情提示你们一下，不要想着领了任务去看这人的真面目，他很残忍，从不手软，对任何人都一样！他是个真的杀手！”韩家公子最后几句说的咬牙切齿，充满怨念，说完便头也不回地离开了。
“什么人啊这是，太自以为是了！”烈烈骂道。
“小姐，背后说人坏话不好。”空气中有人说话。
“怎么还有人啊！”烈烈气得跺脚，“快滚，你个偷窥狂！”烈烈对着空气挥舞拳脚。
“走吧烈烈。”七月上来拉走了烈烈。
“我们要不要领任务啊七月姐？”落落问。
“领。”七月决然地说，“但不是去看他的真面目，是看有没有能帮上忙的地方。”

The young master of the Han family stopped in his tracks.
"We know your name, and we know your appearance, don't you fear that we will reveal it?" Lì Liè shouted.
"Lì Liè!" July and Là Là seemed to have not expected Lì Liè to say that.
"Threaten me?" The young master of the Han family turned around.
"It's not a threat, I mean, we know your identity, so why can't we see other people? We promise to keep it a secret!" Lì Liè said.
The young master of the Han family smiled and pointed at July, "Ask our leader, maybe she will understand my intentions."
July was taken aback.
"Don't follow me anymore. I have a bad temper, and my mood is not good now, I'm easy to get angry. As a friendly reminder, don't think about getting the task and seeing the true face of this person, he is very cruel and merciless, and treats everyone the same! He's a real killer!" The young master of the Han family said with gritted teeth, full of resentment, and then left without looking back.
"What kind of person is this, too self-righteous!" Lì Liè cursed.
"Miss, it's not good to speak ill of people behind their backs."
Someone spoke up in the air.

"How did you get here?" Lì Liè was furious and stomped her foot, "Get out, you pervert!"
July came over and pulled Lì Liè away.
"Should we take the task, July sister?" Là Là asked.
"Yes," July said decisively, "but not to see his true face, but to see if there's anything we can help with."

Note: Some Chinese names and terms may not have direct English translations, so I tried to keep them as close to the original as possible.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

100.第100章 买地（1）
连芳洲和连泽将那一大袋子土豆弄了回家，三姑奶奶几个人都凑上来看稀罕。
三姑奶奶便道：“种了一辈子地还从来没听说过土里还能长豆子的！这玩意儿到底长个乍样我得好好瞧瞧！”
“我也没见过呢！我也要看！”连芳清和连澈也都睁大眼睛瞧着。
打开麻袋口，连芳清和连澈便争着从里面掏出了一个，比个鸡蛋还大，两人都惊讶的“呀”了一声，笑嘻嘻的说着稀罕话。
三姑奶奶也吃了一惊，叫道：“这就是那土豆啊，可真大个！哎呀，还带着泥呢！”
连芳洲笑笑，心道这还算是小的了，想必是受了种子本身和种植技术的限制，要是在现代，成年人拳头大的也不稀罕。
“我觉得长得一点也不像豆子！”连澈端详端详。
“就是不知道好吃不好吃！”连芳清脆声说道。
三姑奶奶就同她相视一笑，说道：“我也正这么想呢！”
连芳洲便笑道：“等明年就有了，保管你们吃个够！这是做种子的，可不能吃！要是叫人知道了，是要受罚的！”
就是连芳清也明白种子的重要性，点了点头。
“就是不知道好种不好种，唉！”三姑奶奶叹了口气。
连芳洲便笑道：“这有什么好种不好种的，嗯，咱们就当跟大豆一样种便是了！”
这事儿官府办得太不靠谱，光把种子发下来就完事了，连个粗浅的指导都没有比如什么时节下种、适合什么样的土地、如要如何浇灌、什么时候收获等。
“说的也是啊！不管怎么的这名字带了个豆字，就跟大豆似的种下去准没错！”三姑奶奶笑道：“还是芳洲聪明！”
众人说笑讨论着，一般这种场合阿简总是不声不响的坐在一旁，并无多话。连泽也多是一旁笑看不语。
说了一阵连芳洲便将麻袋仔细扎好口，拍拍手笑道：“好了，这看也看过了，都洗洗睡吧！这些种子明儿得放阁楼上去！三姑奶奶，明天一早我和阿简、阿泽要进城，这几天可能都会很忙，家里的事情就全靠你照应了！”
三姑奶奶笑着答应，众人便收拾着睡了。
第二天吃过早饭，连芳洲和连泽、阿简便出门往县城去了。

Chapter 100: Buying Land (1)

Lian Fengzhou and Lian Ze brought home a large bag of potatoes, and the three aunties gathered around to take a look.

The three aunties said, "I've been farming for a lifetime, and I've never heard of potatoes growing in the soil! What kind of thing is this? I want to take a closer look!"

"I've never seen it before either! I want to see it too!" Lian Fengqing and Lian Che also widened their eyes to take a look.

They opened the bag and Lian Fengqing and Lian Che both reached in and pulled out one, comparing it to an egg. They both exclaimed in surprise and laughed, saying strange things.

The three aunties were also surprised, and one of them exclaimed, "This is the potato! It's really big! And it's still got dirt on it!"

Lian Fengzhou smiled and thought to herself, "This is still small, I'm sure it's limited by the seed itself and the planting technique. If it were in modern times, even a grown-up's fist-sized one wouldn't be rare."

"I don't think it looks like a potato at all!" Lian Che examined it carefully.

"I wonder if it's edible or not!" Lian Fengqing said in a clear voice.

The three aunties looked at each other and smiled, with one of them saying, "I was just thinking the same thing!"

Lian Fengzhou then said, "Wait until next year, and you'll have plenty to eat! This is a seed, you can't eat it! If people find out, we'll be in trouble!"

Even Lian Fengqing understood the importance of the seed, and nodded her head.

"I wonder if it's a good seed or a bad one, oh dear!" the three aunties sighed.

Lian Fengzhou then said, "What's there to worry about? Let's just plant it like soybeans, okay?"

The government's handling of this matter was very sloppy. They just sent down the seeds and that was it, without any guidance on when to plant, what kind of soil to use, how to water it, or when to harvest.

"That's true! As long as it's got the word 'bean' in the name, it's like soybeans, so it must be fine!" the three aunties laughed.

The group continued to chat and discuss, with Ah Jian usually sitting quietly in the corner, saying nothing. Lian Ze also mostly just sat there, smiling and not speaking.

After a while, Lian Fengzhou carefully tied up the bag and clapped her hands, saying, "Alright, that's enough looking. Let's all go to bed! These seeds need to be stored on the attic tomorrow. Auntie, tomorrow morning Ah Jian, Ah Ze, and I will go to the county town, so you'll have to take care of everything at home."

The three aunties smiled and agreed, and the group went to bed.

The next day, after breakfast, Lian Fengzhou, Lian Ze, and Ah Jian left for the county town.

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

阿简便说道：“如果银钱不紧的话，买头驴子、一辆驴车吧，往后恐怕用的时候还多着呢，光靠走路，不但更累，也耽搁事！”
连芳洲想了想正是这个理，不但要买驴子，也要买牛，还有许多农具也得添置更新，这些回头都得做出一份计划来！
不过眼下还是先买地最要紧！先将地买好了，其他的便按照田地数量来斟酌添置。
“我也是这么想呢！等咱们看好了地，这几日顺便就逛逛牲口市场问问价钱吧！价钱合适就买了，冬天买牲口，可比开春了要便宜些呢！咱们就自己辛苦些照应过冬！”连芳洲便笑道。
连泽听了十分欢喜，笑道：“姐，咱们家也要买驴子和驴车了？真是想都不敢想呢！姐姐放心，到时候我和澈儿会好好照料驴子的！”
“哦，不耽搁你练功吧？”连芳洲挑了挑眉打趣，三个人都笑了起来。
连泽今日天没亮就起来练功了，说是以后都要如此，他果然在更加努力的学习武功，将来要保护她，保护这个家。
“姐！”连泽挠挠头，甚是不好意思，又一本正经道：“不会的！我也要帮着家里干活才行啊，他们还小，不能累着姐姐一个了！”
“真是姐姐的好弟弟！”连芳洲就笑道。
三人进城，便先去了钱庄兑换了一张一千两的银票，兑换成七张一百两的，还有三百两则兑成了五十两、十两若干，又换了十两碎银揣在身上零用。
因为大房村离县城并不太远，所以他们找地保便直接进城，若是离县城太偏远的地方，办这类事情便去就近的镇子上了。
三人打听了管县城周边地区土地买卖的地保刘甲家在何处，便在点心铺里买了两盒点心去了。
刘甲恰好在家，见三个陌生人上门便知道肯定是生意上门了，便很客气的笑着招呼：“几位贵姓？是来买地的吧？呵呵，快进来坐！”
刘甲说话是向着阿简的，三个人只有阿简是成年男人，他理所当然认为做主的是阿简。
阿简点了点头通了姓名，便说道：“我们是想看看山地，不知道有没有什么合适的？”
连芳洲便加了一句：“我们是大房村的，您看看在大房村或者附近村子可有要卖的！”

result:
system

A Jian said straightforwardly, "If we have enough money, let's buy a donkey and a donkey cart. We'll probably need them later, and just walking will not only be more tiring, but also waste time!"

Lian Fengzhou thought for a moment and it was exactly this reasoning. Not only did they need to buy a donkey, but also a cow, and many agricultural tools needed to be replaced. All of these would have to be planned out in the end!

However, for now, it was still most urgent to buy the land first! After buying the land, they could then consider buying other things according to the size of the land.

"I think the same way!" Lian Fengzhou said with a smile. "After we've looked at the land, let's go to the livestock market and ask about the prices over the next few days! If the prices are reasonable, we'll buy them. Buying livestock in winter is much cheaper than in spring! We'll just have to work harder to take care of them over the winter!"

Lian Ze was very happy to hear this and said with a smile, "Sister, our family is also going to buy a donkey and a donkey cart? I never even dared to think about it! Sister, don't worry, when the time comes, I and Chede will take good care of the donkey!"

"Oh, won't that interfere with your practice?" Lian Fengzhou teased, raising an eyebrow. The three of them laughed together.

Lian Ze had gotten up before dawn to practice today, saying that he would do so from now on. He was indeed working harder to learn martial arts, and he wanted to protect her and protect this family in the future.

"Sister!" Lian Ze scratched his head, looking very embarrassed, and then spoke seriously, "No, I also want to help out at home! They're still young, and can't burden you alone!"

"Really, my good brother!" Lian Fengzhou laughed.

The three of them went into the city and first went to the money exchange to exchange a 1,000-ounce silver note for seven 100-ounce notes, and the remaining 300 ounces was exchanged for 50 ounces, 10 ounces, and some small change, and they also exchanged 10 ounces of small silver coins to carry with them.

Because Big House Village is not too far from the county town, they directly went to the county town to find the land guarantor. If it was a remote area, they would go to the nearest town to handle this kind of business.

The three of them asked around and found out that the land guarantor, Liu Jia, was at home, so they went to a pastry shop to buy two boxes of pastries.

Liu Jia just happened to be at home and saw the three strangers coming to his door, so he knew it was business. He smiled and greeted them warmly, "What are your surnames, gentlemen? Are you here to buy land? Ha ha, please come in and sit down!"

Liu Jia spoke to A Jian, assuming that A Jian was the one in charge. A Jian nodded and introduced himself, and then said, "We're looking for mountain land, and we don't know if there's any suitable one."

Lian Fengzhou added, "We're from Big House Village, can you take a look at the land in Big House Village or nearby villages that are for sale?"

prompt.content: You are a helpful translator and only output the result. Translate this from Chinese to English:

刘甲手里正有好几处水田要卖，听到他们问不值钱的旱地，心里那热乎劲儿一下子便下去了许多。不过，蚊子腿也是肉啊，更别说这是他的本职工作了，脸上的笑意仍在，便问道：“我拿册子来看一看，不知你们要买多少呢？”
一边说一边去里间屋子去拿那专门记载的册子。
连芳洲就笑笑，说道：“大概两千来亩吧！”
“多少？”刘甲正从里屋出来，闻言猛的睁大眼睛瞪向连芳洲反问。
“两千来亩，您看看手头上有现成的吗？如果没有的话，能不能帮着想想办法？”连芳洲笑着，字字句句清清楚楚的落入了刘甲的耳中。
刘甲愣了愣，又朝阿简征询的看了过去。
“详细情形，你跟连姑娘说吧！”阿简便笑道。这些种田种地之类的事情，他可不太懂。
“这……”刘甲动了动唇，一拍脑袋坐下，笑道：“干了小半辈子地保，我可真是看走眼了！你们要这么多地，只怕还真不知有没有呢！”
刘甲在册子上仔细的看了看，不多会眼睛一亮，笑道：“这儿倒是有一处较为合适的！”
这里你们大房村王财主家嫌这些旱地没什么出产又费事，正要卖了，共是一百六十多亩，这儿离着不远，是杨家村杨员外的，大约有三百八十亩，他家儿子做生意急需用大笔钱，家里田地出卖不少，这正是其中一处！这中间一大片，大约有两百八十多亩分属四户人家的，你们若想连成一片可以跟人说说或买或换，当然，价钱上只怕要吃点儿亏。
剩下的这一大片六百多亩，都是无主的荒地，若要买，得先交垦荒费给村里，再按官价缴纳一笔土地买卖钱到官府，可得多花点钱……当然，这也是有优惠的，前三年都不用交税。这一共算下来，就是一千五百多亩！

Liu Jia had several plots of watered land to sell, but when he heard them ask about the value of dry land, his enthusiasm suddenly decreased. However, he still had a job to do, and his smile remained. He asked, "I'll go get the ledger to take a look. How many do you want to buy?"

As he spoke, he went into the inner room to get the ledger. Lian Fangzhou smiled and said, "About two thousand mu."

Liu Jia, who was just coming out of the inner room, suddenly widened his eyes and looked at Lian Fangzhou in surprise. "How many?" he asked.

"Two thousand mu. Do you have that much available? If not, can you help me think of a way?" Lian Fangzhou smiled and clearly explained to Liu Jia.

Liu Jia was stunned for a moment, then looked at A Jian for help. "Explain the details to Miss Lian," A Jian said with a smile, not understanding much about farming.

Liu Jia moved his lips, slapped his head, and sat down, laughing. "I've been a land guardian for half a lifetime, and I've really misjudged this! You want that much land, I'm afraid there may not be any!"

Liu Jia carefully looked at the ledger, and soon his eyes lit up with a smile. "There's a suitable one here!"

This land, which the wealthy Mr. Wang of the Big House Village wanted to sell because it was unproductive and troublesome, was about 160 mu. It was not far from here, and belonged to Yang Yewang of Yang Family Village, with about 380 mu. His son was in urgent need of a large sum of money, and the family had sold a lot of land. This was one of the plots!

In the middle of this large piece of land, about 280 mu belonged to four households. If you wanted to connect it all, you could talk to the owners about buying or exchanging it, but you would likely have to take a loss on the price.

The remaining 660 mu was uncultivated land without an owner. If you wanted to buy it, you would have to pay the village a reclamation fee and then pay the official price for the land sale to the government, which would cost a lot of money. However, there was a discount - you wouldn't have to pay taxes for the first three years.

In total, this would be about 1,500 mu.
